D

Direction - Enum Class in Unnamed Package
Rays only ever have one of six slopes in Blackbox+ To simplify the logic, it uses this enum type instead of six decimal values for slope This reduces error, simplifies a lot of methods and makes the program more efficient
Direction() - Constructor for enum class Direction
 
distanceBetween(double[], double[]) - Method in class Ray

G

getAdjacentHexagon(Direction) - Method in class Cell
Method uses a switch statement and external methods to find neighbor of a cell in a given direction When applied, this method will sometimes return null This is intended and helps map the board's edges
